tasks.label: Build: tfidf_serial
args: "${env:ProgramFiles(x86)}\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars64.bat" && if not exist build mkdir build && if not exist bin mkdir bin && cl /nologo /TC /std:c17 /O2 src\tfidf_serial.c /Fo:build\ /Fe:bin\tf_idf_serial.exe

tasks.label: Build: tfidf_mpi
args: "${env:ProgramFiles(x86)}\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars64.bat" && if not exist build mkdir build && if not exist bin mkdir bin && cl /nologo /TC /std:c17 /O2 src\tfidf_mpi.c /Fo:build\ /Fe:bin\tfidf_mpi.exe /I "${env:ProgramFiles(x86)}\Microsoft SDKs\MPI\Include" /link /LIBPATH:"${env:ProgramFiles(x86)}\Microsoft SDKs\MPI\Lib\x64" msmpi.lib

tasks.label: Clean
args: if exist build del /q build\*.obj & if exist bin del /q bin\*.exe
